#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

struct Entry {
    int key;
    int count;
};

int compare(const void *a, const void *b) {
    return ((struct Entry *)a)->key - ((struct Entry *)b)->key;
}

// Binary search to find the index of the largest entry with key < x
int find_lower(struct Entry *entries, int size, int x) {
    int left = 0, right = size - 1;
    int res = -1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (entries[mid].key < x) {
            res = mid;
            left = mid + 1;
        } else {
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    return res;
}

// Binary search to find the index of entry with key == x
int find_exact(struct Entry *entries, int size, int x) {
    int left = 0, right = size - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (entries[mid].key == x) {
            return mid;
        } else if (entries[mid].key < x) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else {
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

int main() {
    int n, x;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    
    struct Entry *entries = NULL;
    int size = 0;
    
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        scanf("%d", &x);
        
        // Find the largest key less than x
        int lower_idx = find_lower(entries, size, x);
        
        if (lower_idx != -1) {
            // Decrement the count of the found entry
            entries[lower_idx].count--;
            if (entries[lower_idx].count == 0) {
                // Remove the entry at lower_idx
                for (int j = lower_idx; j < size - 1; ++j) {
                    entries[j] = entries[j + 1];
                }
                size--;
                // Reallocate to free memory if needed
                entries = realloc(entries, size * sizeof(struct Entry));
            }
        }
        
        // Now, add x to the entries
        int exact_idx = find_exact(entries, size, x);
        if (exact_idx != -1) {
            entries[exact_idx].count++;
        } else {
            // Insert new entry
            struct Entry new_entry = {x, 1};
            // Find the insertion point to keep the array sorted
            int insert_idx = 0;
            while (insert_idx < size && entries[insert_idx].key < x) {
                insert_idx++;
            }
            entries = realloc(entries, (size + 1) * sizeof(struct Entry));
            // Shift elements to make space
            for (int j = size; j > insert_idx; --j) {
                entries[j] = entries[j - 1];
            }
            entries[insert_idx] = new_entry;
            size++;
        }
    }
    
    // Calculate the sum of counts
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
        ans += entries[i].count;
    }
    printf("%d\n", ans);
    
    free(entries);
    return 0;
}
